ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: D.L.D. wrote the first draft of this commentary which was then edited by T.R.F., with a subsequent two rounds of iterations between them. The ideas and concepts are based on working together on DMCs for almost 40 years including 10 years together on AIDs clinical trials, coauthoring a textbook on DMCs in its second edition, and several joint publications on the topic of DMCs.
